definitions.text: a yawl used by a ship's sailors for general work
be silly or tease one another
examples: After we relaxed, we just kidded around

definitions.text: full of or showing high-spirited merriment; ; - Wordsworth
examples: when hearts were young and gay
a poet could not but be gay, in such a jocund company
the jolly crowd at the reunion

definitions.text: to a moderately sufficient extent or degree
examples: he is fairly clever with computers
